name: Textualizer
description: Textualizer is a jQuery plug-in that allows you to transition through blurbs of text. When transitioning to a new blurb, any character that is common to the next blurb is kept on the screen, and moved to its new position.

name: Provision
description: ProvisionJS is a set of JavaScript code blocks that provide a solid foundation to build modular UI Controls for use in Web 2.0+ applications
